section.name: New Releases
section.p: Jan 29, 2015. OpenIDM 2.1.2 sustaining release is available. See the release notes for more information.
JDec 4, 2014. OpenIDM 3.1.0 is available. See the release notes for more information.
Aug 11, 2014. OpenIDM 3.0.0 is now available. See the release notes for more information.
December 20, 2013. OpenIDM 2.1.1 is now available. See the release notes for more information.
February 20, 2013. OpenIDM 2.1.0 is now available. Read the corresponding documentation here.
March 30, 2012. OpenIDM 2.0.3 is now available. This is the latest update on the 2.0.x branch. You can download OpenIDM 2.0.3 from the download page. Also read the release notes.
February 9, 2012. OpenIDM 2.0.2 has been released as the latest supported version on the 2.0.x branch. Get it now from the download page. See the release notes for more information.
January 15, 2012. OpenIDM 2.0.1 is out. You can download it at ForgeRock.org/openidm.html. See the release notes for details.
December 24, 2011. OpenIDM 2.0.0 is now available. Get it from the download page. See the list of fixes in the release notes.

May 31, 2011. The OpenIDM team has announced OpenIDM 2.0 Milestone 1, the revolutionary step towards the next generation, lightweight, scalable, highly modular and developer friendly Identity Management solution. OpenIDM 2.0 Milestone 1 includes full capability to perform synchronization, reconciliation and basic account administration as well as exposing a RESTful web API to the core services of OpenIDM. Visit the download page to get started.
